com.versant.var.message
Class VARDefaultObjectWriter

java.lang.Object
  com.versant.var.message.VARDefaultObjectWriter
All Implemented Interfaces:
VARIObjectWriter
public class VARDefaultObjectWriter
extends java.lang.Object
implements VARIObjectWriter

The default implementation of ObjectWriter interface. Creates/updates versant db objects from VDSObjects Does not have any VDSClass caching, therefore assumes VDSObjects have reference to VDSClass objects. deletes versant db objects from stringified loids

See Also:
